column3: I discovered this place about 4 years ago (or more) - this was when all the Sugar Landers stayed in Sugar Land and dined at the local Panera or La Mads
column4: when Houston was unexplored by suburbans
column5: and when there was still only one Local Foods location. Since then
column6: everyone and their mom has found out about it and it's basically the equivalent of Peru as a travel destination. It's cool
column7: just remember I was your loyal patron when there was ample seating space at any and all times.
